posts.post_content:
I have approx. 170 available.  About half are in stellar condition, sharp, good contrast, no damage.  The rest vary. If you have a want list or an upgrade list LMK.  Scans available as needed.  These will eventually end up on eBay priced higher, so now's the time to get in.  

Zelle preferred, PP and Venmo also accepted, or checks and cash via snail mail.  Shipping TBD based on the # of cards.
